title: Trolls
description: Trolls are fearsome and blood-thirsty, with a taste for human flesh. The heroic endeavours of Safety Patrol have kept the peace for the citizens of Trolberg for generations.
quote: Trolls and humans may be natural enemies.
creator: Safety Patrol
altHero: obvious troll costume emerging from the bushes
alt1: illustration of schism between men and trolls
alt2: two costumed trolls approaching an A-frame cabin
alt3: troll fighting with Safety Patrol officer Erik Ahlberg
